strapiPost.title: Organization Putting On Arkansas Parks Painting Project
strapiPost.content:
The Heart of American Artists Association is kicking off its latest project ‘Painting the Arkansas Parks’ on March 24-26 at Hobbs State Park-Conservation Area. 

  • Plein air: During the 3-day event, artists will scatter across the state park with their supplies and paint interpretations of the outdoor environment’s natural beauty. On Saturday, March 26, the association will host an exhibit and sale of the artists’ best pieces they created during the event.
  • Natural beauty: The Painting the Arkansas Parks project is a 2-year project that will include a series of outdoor painting events to honor the state parks of Arkansas. Each event will take place in a major geographical region in Arkansas. 

For details and to enter the project as an artist, click HERE.
